words.definition: A large vehicle that carries passengers by road.
words.arabic_definition: مركبة كبيرة تنقل الركاب على الطريق.

example.en: I take the bus to school.

words.definition: A road vehicle with an engine, used for transporting people.
A long vehicle that runs on tracks and carries people or goods.
words.arabic_definition: مركبة طويلة تسير على سكك حديدية وتنقل الأشخاص أو البضائع.

example.en: We traveled to another city by train.

words.definition: A two-wheeled vehicle that you ride by pedaling.
words.arabic_definition: مركبة ذات عجلتين تُقاد بواسطة الدواسات.

example.en: He rides his bicycle every morning.

words.definition: A car that you pay to take you somewhere.
words.arabic_definition: سيارة تدفع مقابل ركوبها لتوصيلك إلى مكان ما.

example.en: We took a taxi to the airport.
